sense.gloss: final stage, final stretch, final spurt, last spurt, final push, late charge
forcing another player to fold (so that oneself can participate in the game)

sdata.j: ↑景気↑↓けいき↓↑後退↑↓こうたい↓は↑賃金↑↓ちんぎん↓↑生活↑↓せいかつ↓↑者↑↓しゃ↓を↑苦境↑↓くきょう↓に↑追↑↓|お↓い↑込↑↓こ↓み|ました。
sdata.e: The recession has put the crunch on wage laborers.
